SELECT DISTINCT CHATTING_NO ,(SELECT MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT * FROM MESSAGE M2 WHERE M2.CHATTING_NO = R.CHATTING_NO ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) LAST_MESSAGE
,( SELECT SEND_TIME FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN SYSDATE - SEND_TIME < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - SEND_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - SEND_TIME < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - SEND_TIME) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - SEND_TIME < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - SEND_TIME) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(SEND_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END SEND_TIME FROM MESSAGE M WHERE M.CHATTING_NO = R.CHATTING_NO ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) "SEND_TIME"
,(SELECT BOARD_IMG FROM TOGETHER T WHERE R.CHATTING_NO = T.BOARD_NO) BOARD_IMG
, (SELECT BOARD_TITLE FROM TOGETHER T WHERE R.CHATTING_NO = T.BOARD_NO) BOARD_TITLE
,(SELECT MAX_PEOPLE FROM TOGETHER T WHERE R.CHATTING_NO = T.BOARD_NO) MAX_PEOPLE
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE M WHERE M.CHATTING_NO = R.CHATTING_NO AND READ_FL = 'N' AND SENDER_NO != #{memberNo}) NOT_READ_COUNT ,(SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_NO) SEND_TIME FROM MESSAGE M WHERE R.CHATTING_NO = M.CHATTING_NO) MAX_MESSAGE_NO
FROM CHATTING_ROOM R JOIN TOGETHER T ON(R.CHATTING_NO = T.BOARD_NO) WHERE OPEN_MEMBER = #{loginMemberNo} OR PARTICIPANT = #{loginMemberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MAX_MESSAGE_NO DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT MESSAGE_NO, MESSAGE_CONTENT, READ_FL, SENDER_NO, CHATTING_NO, TO_CHAR(SEND_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') SEND_TIME , MEMBER_PROFILE "senderProfile", MEMBER_NICKNAME "senderNickname" FROM MESSAGE S JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = S.SENDER_NO) WHERE CHATTING_NO = #{chattingNo} ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE (MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${query}%' OR MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%') AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO != ${memberNo}
